Gullfoss.name: Gullfoss
Gullfoss.description: The Golden Falls - Iceland's most famous two-tiered waterfall with thunderous power and rainbows on sunny days.
tips: Best photos from upper viewing platform
Wear waterproof clothing - gets very misty
Visit during golden hour for magical lighting

Geysir.name: Geysir
Geysir.description: Historic geothermal area with Strokkur geyser erupting every 5-10 minutes up to 20 meters high.
tips: Strokkur is more active than the original Geysir
Stand upwind to avoid sulfur smell
Wait for multiple eruptions for best photos

Bruarfoss.name: Bruarfoss
Bruarfoss.description: Hidden gem waterfall with stunning blue water cascading over dark rocks. Requires short hike to reach.
tips: Most beautiful waterfall in Iceland according to many

Kerið.name: Kerið Crater
Kerið.description: Volcanic crater lake with striking red and orange crater walls surrounding a deep blue-green lake.
tips: Walk around the rim for different viewpoints
Beautiful at sunset with golden lighting

Reykjadalur.name: Reykjadalur Hot Springs
Reykjadalur.description: Natural geothermal river where you can bathe in warm waters after a scenic 3km hike through steaming valley.
tips: Water temperature varies along the river

Landmannalaugar.name: Landmannalaugar
Landmannalaugar.description: Stunning highland destination famous for colorful rhyolite mountains, natural hot springs, and dramatic landscapes.

Jökulsárlón.name: Jökulsárlón
Jökulsárlón.description: Spectacular glacier lagoon filled with floating icebergs calving from Breiðamerkurjökull glacier.
tips: Boat tours available for closer iceberg experience
Best light for photography in early morning/evening

Diamond Beach.name: Diamond Beach
Diamond Beach.description: Black volcanic sand beach where crystal-clear icebergs from Jökulsárlón wash ashore like scattered diamonds.
tips: Never turn your back on the waves

Svartifoss.name: Svartifoss
Svartifoss.description: Unique waterfall surrounded by dark basalt columns that inspired Reykjavik's Hallgrímskirkja church design.
tips: Well-marked trail but can be icy

Kirkjufellsfoss.name: Kirkjufellsfoss
Kirkjufellsfoss.description: Picturesque waterfall with iconic Kirkjufell mountain backdrop - one of the most photographed locations in Iceland.

Dettifoss.name: Dettifoss
Dettifoss.description: Europe's most powerful waterfall by volume, with 500 cubic meters of water per second thundering over 45m cliff.
tips: Accessible from both east and west sides
West side (862) has better views but rougher road
Extremely loud - you'll feel the power

Blue Lagoon.name: Blue Lagoon
Blue Lagoon.description: Famous geothermal spa with milky blue waters rich in silica and minerals, offering luxury wellness experience.
